content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price. What is your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I would like to pay 400 euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because your offer is too low for the value of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in renting the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. How about 450 Euros per month? It is a fair price considering the location and the size of the apartment.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euros is still too low for the value of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in renting the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euros is still too low for the value of the apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer if you are interested in renting the apartment.
